instructions.title: How To Delete Your PayPal Account
instructions.before: Deleting your Paypal Account is Easy.  PayPal provides a delete link from within their website.  You cannot delete your account from a mobile app.

qnAnswers.question: What happens when I delete my PayPal account?
qnAnswers.answer: Upon Account Deletion any unpaid money requests are automatically canceled and you lose any unused redemption codes or coupons.

qnAnswers.question: Why won't PayPal let me close my account?
qnAnswers.answer: You cannot close your account if there are limitations, unresolved issues, or a balance. Please contact [customer service here] (https://www.paypal.com/us/selfhelp/contact/email/privacy) if you are experiencing any these issues.

qnAnswers.question: Can I re-open a PayPal account with the same email address of my Deleted Account?
qnAnswers.answer: Yes.  PayPal allows this.  But you must remove your email address from the account you want to delete before you delete it.  [Click here] (https://www.paypal.com/myaccount/settings/)to navigate to the account settings page to remove your email address.

qnAnswers.question: I signed up for PayPal using a facebook, what do I do?
qnAnswers.answer: You can Delete your account by following the steps above. However, please log onto facebook and remove third party access from facebook to your paypal account.

qnAnswers.question: Can I delete my account if I do not remember my password?
qnAnswers.answer: No. You must be able to log into your account to delete it.  For more information on recovering your password please [Click here] (https://www.paypal.com/us/smarthelp/article/i-forgot-my-password.-how-do-i-reset-it-faq1933)
